mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moments_like (id, post_id, user_id, created_at) SELECT #{params.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{params.post_id}, #{params.user_id}, NOW() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM moments_like WHERE post_id = #{params.post_id} AND user_id = #{params.user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT l.user_id as userId, p.display_name as username, p.avatar FROM moments_like l LEFT JOIN user_profile p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY l.created_at DESC LIMIT 10
